name: Pong and Paddle's Epic Adventure
description:
AIE Year 1 Major Project

In this game, you move throughout the level as the ball but to move you move change the position of the paddles around each room at the same time to direct yourself to the next room, after that the player will the go into a classic pong style boss fight, at the end of the level, when you beat the boss, you can buy an upgrades with the coins that are around each level.

You’re the Pong Ball exploring through the map, navigating through a set level with the only way to control your movement is to interfere your movement with bats around the map which you control every single one of them at the same time. Get to the end of the level and try to collect as much coins as you can. 

Developer Credit:
